relation: Perform a 2X Burnout during the Near Miss Challenge on Autobahn event (6th event in World Tour Tuned Series) to win/unlock this car.
Get the Gold Medal in the Dominator Challenge on Steeltown Works event (13th event in World Tour Tuned Series) to win/unlock this car.
Drift over 9,000 ft. in the Race on Bushido Valley event (3rd event in World Tour Tuned Series) to win/unlock this car.
Takedown the Tuned Muscle 3 times in the Race on Steeltown Works event (10th event in World Tour Tuned Series) to win/unlock this car.
Get 50,000 Maniac Points during the Maniac on Autobahn event (7th event in World Tour Tuned Series) to win/unlock this car.

textAfterTable: Signature Takedowns are takedowns that are performed in World Tour Mode, and will unlock a photo in the Signature Takedowns section of your Driver Details area. If all 20 are performed, the "Oval Racer Special" vehicle will be unlocked. Unlockable How to Unlock Avalanche!
